thread.title_full: Land Rover to unveil all new Range Rover Velar on March 1 : Geneva Motor Show 2017, News - India Today

title: Land Rover to unveil all new Range Rover Velar on March 1 : Geneva Motor Show 2017, News - India Today
text:
Land Rover to unveil all new Range Rover Velar on March 1 IndiaToday.in | New Delhi, February 22, 2017 | Posted by Pratik Rakshit | UPDATED 13:17 IST 
The luxury SUV was created in 1970 when Land Rover launched the original Range Rover. Almost half a century later that spirit of innovation continues with the introduction of the fourth member of the Range Rover family. Land Rover will unveil the all new Range Rover Velar on March 1, 2017. The company will also showcase the Range Rover Velar at the upcoming Geneva Motor Show. Range Rover Velar 
Elegant simplicity, a visually reductive approach and pioneering consumer technology are the hallmarks of the new Range Rover Velar. Refined for every occasion, for every terrain, Velar uses unique sustainable materials and advanced engineering to continue Land Rover's drive to go Above and Beyond. 
The origin of the Velar name (pronounced vel-ar) dates back to the first Range Rover prototypes of the Sixties: the pioneers of the luxury SUV landscape. Range Rover Velar 
When development engineers needed to hide the true identity of the 26 pre-production Range Rovers, they chose the name Velar, derived from the Latin velare meaning to veil or cover.
